original_text: Then were the men exceedingly afraid, and said unto him. Why hast thou done this? For the men knew that he fled from the presence of the Lord, because he had told them.
korean_text: 자기가 여호와의 얼굴을 피함인 줄을 그들에게 말하였으므로 무리가 알고 심히 두려워하여 이르되 네가 어찌하여 그렇게 행하였느냐 하니라

sentences.original_text: Then were the men exceedingly afraid
For the men knew that he fled
sentences.korean_translation: 이는 사람들이 그가 도망한 것을 알았음이라

sentences.original_text: from the presence of the Lord
